name: ITalk2Learn
body:
### Welcome to iTalk2Learn project.
iTalk2Learn is a learning platform for children aged between 8 and 12 years old. It is an open source platform which integrates structured practice and exploratory, conceptually-oriented learning. It facilitates interaction in different modalities including speech, as well as multiple representations which can be manipulated and reasoned with when learning fractions.

### Installation
Compiling the iTalk2Learn system itself can be done using

mvn install

This generates two "war" files which can be deployed by Tomcat 7. One is the platform and the other one is the speech production software.

Some modules are not public, please [contact](http://www.italk2learn.eu/contact/) to request more info.

### Instructions
It is required to have a database and LDAP running. The project is based on MariaDB 5.5 and ApacheDS. Files to populate can found [here](https://github.com/it2l/italk2learn/tree/master/it2l-platform/Files)

Remember point to your resources at [Property files](https://github.com/it2l/italk2learn/blob/master/it2l-platform/src/main/resources/italk2learn-config.properties) to the right location.
